name: Cuties in Kilkenny
description:
It's been years since you and all your old friends from Kilkenny saw each other.
A mysterious letter gathers the whole gang together again.
Rekindling friendships, rivalries and... who knows what else?
Just sit back, enjoy the banter and see where the night takes you...

A short slice of life visual novel made with my friends.
Each artist designed their character without consulting anyone else on style or tone.
I then wrote some wacky conversations to loosely tie them all together.
